definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: There are differences in the definition of floating-point numbers and long variable types.
sentences.chinese: 浮点型数字和长变量类型的定义是有差异的。

sentences.english: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 将指定的十进制数的值转换为等效的单精度浮点数。

sentences.english: Computer principle of a floating point arithmetic unit.
sentences.chinese: 计算机组成原理的一个浮点数运算器。

sentences.english: For floating-point and fixed-point types, M is the total number of digits that can be stored.
sentences.chinese: 对于浮点数及定点类型，M是数字存储的总位数。

sentences.english: It lacked floating point and parallel processing ability.
sentences.chinese: 它缺少浮点和并行处理功能。

sentences.english: They don't distinguish between integer and floating point numbers. Variables are typeless.
sentences.chinese: 脚本不区分整数和浮点数，变量是没有类型的。
制作一个单一浮点数可拖动控制柄。

sentences.english: If you're reading a floating point number, there are other concerns.
sentences.chinese: 如果您读取的浮点数，还有另外需要关注的问题。

sentences.english: This is similar to the modulo operator but it works with floating point numbers.
sentences.chinese: 这是类似于模运算符，但可以使用浮点数。

sentences.english: Converts a specified value to a single-precision floating-point number.
sentences.chinese: 将指定的值转换为单精确度浮点数。

sentences.english: Rounds a double-precision floating-point value to the nearest integer.
sentences.chinese: 将双精度浮点值舍入至指定的小数位数。

sentences.english: So, a 32 bit of float gives you a bunch of precision.
sentences.chinese: 2比特的浮点型数据精度更大。

sentences.english: Designing a floating point calculator using FPGA technology may shorten the development cycle of product.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了基于FPGA技术的浮点运算器的设计与实现。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to design high performance FPU.
sentences.chinese: 因此，高性能浮点微处理单元的设计是非常有必要。
编写一个单精度浮点数。

sentences.english: Just write a program to find the max of x and y.
sentences.chinese: 就写个程序找出浮点数x和y中的最大值吧。

definition: unsigned (i.e. the absolute value, regardless of plus or minus sign)
